pe":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"","type":"uint256[]"},{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"","type":"uint256[]"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"","type":"bytes"}],"name":"onERC1155BatchReceived","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"","type":"bytes4"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"","type":"bytes"}],"name":"onERC1155Received","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"","type":"bytes4"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"owner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenContract","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"recipient","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"paused","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"artifactsToMint","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"minterReward","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"maxArtifactPrice","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateBounty","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenContract","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"tokenIds","type":"uint256[]"},{"internalType":"address","name":"recipient","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawArtifacts","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenContract","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawBalance","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"ripe","details":"This contract incentivizes community members to execute mints on behalf of the owner by offering artifact rewards and gas refunds. Designed specifically for daily artifact drops on the Mint protocol (mint.vv.xyz) where timing is critical. The owner funds bounties with ETH and sets parameters like reward amounts and gas limits. When new artifacts become available, any minter can execute the bounty to: - Mint the total specified number of artifacts (artifactsToMint) - Receive their reward artifacts immediately (minterReward amount) - Get a full gas refund from the bounty balance (including base tx cost) - Leave the owner's artifacts in the contract for later withdrawal (artifactsToMint - minterReward) This creates a win-win: owners never miss drops, minters earn artifacts for their service.","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"claimBounty(address)":{"details":"Mints artifacts, sends minter their reward, refunds gas (including base tx cost), keeps owner's portion","params":{"tokenContract":"The Mint collection to claim the bounty for Gas Refund Details: - Refunds claiming gas + 21,000 base transaction cost + ETH transfer gas - Minter's net cost is effectively zero (maybe a few hundred gas units) Requirements: - Bounty must exist and not be paused - New token ID must be available (higher than last minted) - Current gas price must be <= maxGasPrice - Bounty must have sufficient balance for mint cost + gas refund - Mint window must still be open"}},"constructor":{"details":"For direct deployment, call initialize(msg.sender) after deployment.      For factory deployment, clones will call initialize with the user's address."},"createBounty(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Overwrites any existing bounty for the same tokenContract. Starts with lastMintedId=0      to allow minting the currently available token immediately.","params":{"artifactsToMint":"Total number of artifacts to mint (e.g., 3 total: 1 for minter, 2 for owner)","maxArtifactPrice":"Maximum price per artifact in wei (e.g., 0.001 ETH = 1000000000000000 wei)                         Since artifact price = block.basefee * 60000, this also limits gas price.                         Example: At 10 gwei basefee, artifact costs 0.0006 ETH","minterReward":"Number of artifacts the minter keeps as payment (e.g., 1 out of 3 total)","recipient":"Address to receive the owner's artifacts when withdrawn","tokenContract":"The Mint collection contract address"}},"fundBounty(address)":{"params":{"tokenContract":"The Mint collection contract to fund"}},"initialize(address)":{"details":"Used by factory for clone deployment. Can only be called once.","params":{"_owner":"The address that will own this bounty contract"}},"isBountyClaimable(address)":{"params":{"tokenContract":"The Mint collection to check"},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if all conditions are met for claiming"}},"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Required for the contract to receive batch ERC1155 transfers","returns":{"_0":"bytes4 The selector to confirm token transfer acceptance"}},"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Required for the contract to claimBounty(address).details: Mints artifacts, sends minter their reward, refunds gas (including base tx cost), keeps owner's portion

params.tokenContract: The Mint collection to claim the bounty for Gas Refund Details: - Refunds claiming gas + 21,000 base transaction cost + ETH transfer gas - Minter's net cost is effectively zero (maybe a few hundred gas units) Requirements: - Bounty must exist and not be paused - New token ID must be available (higher than last minted) - Current gas price must be <= maxGasPrice - Bounty must have sufficient balance for mint cost + gas refund - Mint window must still be open

constructor.details: For direct deployment, call initialize(msg.sender) after deployment.      For factory deployment, clones will call initialize with the user's address.

createBounty(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Overwrites any existing bounty for the same tokenContract. Starts with lastMintedId=0      to allow minting the currently available token immediately.

params.artifactsToMint: Total number of artifacts to mint (e.g., 3 total: 1 for minter, 2 for owner)
params.maxArtifactPrice: Maximum price per artifact in wei (e.g., 0.001 ETH = 1000000000000000 wei)                         Since artifact price = block.basefee * 60000, this also limits gas price.                         Example: At 10 gwei basefee, artifact costs 0.0006 ETH
params.minterReward: Number of artifacts the minter keeps as payment (e.g., 1 out of 3 total)
params.recipient: Address to receive the owner's artifacts when withdrawn

params.tokenContract: The Mint collection contract to fund

initialize(address).details: Used by factory for clone deployment. Can only be called once.

params._owner: The address that will own this bounty contract

returns._0: bool True if all conditions are met for claiming

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: Required for the contract to receive batch ERC1155 transfers

returns._0: bytes4 The selector to confirm token transfer acceptance

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: Required for the contract to receive ERC1155 tokens

returns._0: bytes4 The selector to confirm token transfer acceptance

updateBounty(address,address,bool,uint25.details: More gas efficient than calling multiple update functions

params.artifactsToMint: New total number of artifacts to mint (minter + owner combined)
params.maxArtifactPrice: New maximum price per artifact in wei
params.minterReward: New number of artifacts for minter (must be less than artifactsToMint)
params.paused: Whether the bounty should be paused
params.recipient: New address to receive owner's artifacts

withdrawArtifacts(address,uint256[],addr.details: Transfers all available balance for each specified token ID

params.recipient: Address to receive the artifacts (can differ from bounty recipient)
params.tokenContract: The Mint collection contract holding the artifacts
params.tokenIds: Array of token IDs to withdraw

params.amount: Amount of ETH to withdraw in wei

bounties(address).notice: Mapping from Mint collection address to its bounty configuration

claimBounty(address).notice: Claims a bounty by minting artifacts and distributing rewards

createBounty(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Creates or updates a bounty for a specific Mint collection

fundBounty(address).notice: Adds ETH to an existing bounty's balance

initialize(address).notice: Initialize the contract with an owner address

isBountyClaimable(address).notice: Checks if a bounty can currently be claimed

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.notice: Handles receipt of multiple ERC1155 token types

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.notice: Handles receipt of a single ERC1155 token type

owner().notice: The owner address who can manage all bounties

updateBounty(address,address,bool,uint25.notice: Updates all bounty parameters in a single transaction

withdrawArtifacts(address,uint256[],addr.notice: Withdraws accumulated artifacts from the contract to a recipient

withdrawBalance(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws ETH from a bounty's balance back to owner
